name: Overcaste
description:
Welcome to Overcaste

Overcaste is a 3D adventure game with brisk and graceful movement, and a beautiful desert to explore. By controlling sand and using the land to your advantage, traverse a wide range of desert locations to drive back the technologically advanced invading force.

You are a sand-shifter

Shape your body and the world around you. Investigate and destroy massive oppressive monoliths looming over the terrain. Gain new abilities and upgrades that will help you move across the desert as fast as possible.

A game by Three Dead Oysters

Overcaste is a game in development by a team of eight. It is built using Unreal Engine 4. There is no final release date in mind, but playtesting builds will be released throughout the Fall 2022 and Spring of 2023.
